Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Options
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Options
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Options class that creates the panel with all the option buttons on the right hand side and maintains all the options that can be changed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Options()
      Option constructor, creates the option panel on the right hand side and initializes all options to off, and difficulty level to easy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Options

        public Options()
        Option constructor, creates the option panel on the right hand side and initializes all options to off, and difficulty level to easy.

    • Method Detail

      • isShowPossible

        public boolean isShowPossible()
        Returns true if the option to show possibilities as text is enabled.
        Returns:
        true is possibilities are to be shown.

      • getPossibleHighlight

        public int getPossibleHighlight()
        Get the number that is being highlighted. 0 if none are being highlighted.
        Returns:
        the number being highlighted.

      • isShowError

        public boolean isShowError()
        Return true if errors are being shown as red text.
        Returns:
        Whether errors are being shown.

      • isShowDeviants

        public boolean isShowDeviants()
        Returns true if deviants are being shown as orange text.
        Returns:
        Whether deviants are being shown.

      • setEvilMode

        public void setEvilMode()
        Set the options panel up for evil mode. This disables all helper buttons apart from hint and turns them off.

      • disableEvilMode

        public void disableEvilMode()
        Disables Evil mode. This enables all the helper buttons.

      • isEvilMode

        public boolean isEvilMode()
        Return whether evil mode is currently on.
        Returns:
        true is evil mode is on, false otherwise.
